post_title: SOLD T206 Hal Chase, Pink Background, Piedmont 350
post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have this 1909-1911 T206 Hal Chase, Pink Background, for sale.

Description: Light creasing just below Chase's chin and lower left corner tip on the front of the card. and a light crease upper right corner on the back of the card. Corner wear. Surface bump just above Chase's head. Light staining front and back of the card. Advertising on the back of the card is off center.

Price: SOLD

Payments accepted: Paypal F/F (Goods and services add 4%), check, or money order.

Note: First post or private message with a commitment to purchase gets the card.

Thanks for looking,
Joe
